pull_requests.title: BIP329: PR 1750 follow-up edits
pull_requests.body: @jonatack Following up on #1750, this PR adds the minor edits you suggested previously which @doc-hex approved, along with another small edit to clarify the address heights specification to align with transaction height.

comment_list.body: Added another small edit to clarify the address `heights` specification to align with transaction `height`.
